 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּעַר‎</span>] **verb** ==open wide== (the mouth) (Late Hebrew rarely = Biblical Hebrew, usually ***open*** bowels, go to stool; compare Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּעַר‎</span>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Biblical Hebrew, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***chasm***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** of voracious greed, figurative 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָֽעֲרָה פִּיהָ‎</span> [[Isa.5.14|Isa 5:14]] (of Sheôl), 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּֽעֲרוּ עָלַי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּפִיהֶם‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:119q»§ 119q</sup>) [[Job.16.10|Job 16:10]] of eager desire (good sense), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיהֶם פָּֽעֲרוּ‎</span> [[Job.29.23|Job 29:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּיפָֿעַרְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.131|Ps 119:131]].
